basics.name: Vamsi Ram Nagothi
basics.label: VueJS | Angular 2+ | SvelteJS | ReactJS | React Native | GraphQL | WebRTC | Go | Micro frontends | Node JS  | Docker | Git | AWS | Cypress | Playwright | JEST
basics.summary: A passionate Engineer, Tech Enthusiast, Author and Speaker from Vijayawada India • Designed Micro DB Architecture to accommodate storing data from various sources. • Designed an end to end chat and calling using WebRTC and agora • Developed a large app with Micro Front-end Architecture • Optimized data tables by replacing them with grid systems • Designed branching strategy to deliver customization without modifying the core product • Built component libraries from scratch in Angular and Vue • Designed caching systems to deliver large data sets without any latency • Integrated over 30 tools via rest API’s into one of the products

work.company: Liminal - Custody Solutions at Coinfest Asia | Bali | 24-25 AUG'23
work.summary: •	Migrated legacy code, ensuring smooth transition. •	Contributed to the project's micro services architecture, incorporating NodeJS and MongoDB. •	Assisted with back-end development using NodeJS, with Docker for containerization. •	Managed deployments through GitLab CI and utilized AWS for hosting and cloud services.

Wurkr : A collaborative virtual workspace where users can work, meet, chat and share screen.  •	Contribute in all phases of the development life cycle  •	Migrate the legacy code  •	Lead the front-end development  •	Contribute to the project architecture  •	Contribute to back-end development when ever necessary

RRS Retail : A product which provides remote monitoring of cash recycling and maintaining machines. •	Worked as a front end developer. •	Migrate the code from Angular to React.  •	Optimized data tables by replacing them with grid systems.  •	Fixed over 700 defects in a span of 3 months.

Associa: Community association and property management system (POC)  •	Built a POC for a client to prove that micro front-end architecture can be used to split a large code base and manage it easily. Also deployments can be made with 0 down time for other features.  •	Lead the front-end effort.

David Jones ITPDE : A project to estimate IT project delivery.  •	Lead the end to end project development  •	Worked on building services in Node JS.  •	Wrote over 100 API’s in NodeJS  •	Supported front-end team to use Data Grid in Angular 7

TED : A product to build Agile dashboards on the fly by integrating various tools.  •	Contribute in all phases of the development life cycle.  •	Lead the front-end development.  •	Designed Micro db Architecture.  •	Contributed to back-end development when ever necessary.  •	Designed branching strategy.  •	Supported DevOps team to Implement CI\CD.  •	Wrote over thousand unit test cases.  •	Integrated over 30 tools via rest API’s.
WeGuard Platform is your one-stop solution for all of your Enterprise Mobility Management needs.

•	Contribute in all phases of the development lifecycle •	Write well designed, testable, efficient code •	Ensure designs are in compliance with specifications •	Prepare and produce releases of software components •	Support continuous improvement by investigating alternatives and technologies and presenting these for architectural review •	Coordinating the workflow between UI developer, Java developer and Database programmer. •	Cooperating with the front-end developer in building the RESTful API. •	Ensured timely delivery and quality all compliant with the client’s quality processes.
